languages.text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
languages.original_text: Если на второй линии нет противников, первая в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} атака каждого союзника в этой зоне требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.

traits.locale_text: If there are no enemies in the Backline area, the first attack in turn made by every ally in that area costs 1 AP less.
If there are no enemies in the Backline area, the first attack in the turn made by every ally in that area costs 1 AP less.

traits.locale_text: Если на {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}второй линии{/g} нет противников, первая в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} атака каждого союзника в этой зоне требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
Если на второй линии нет противников, первая в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} атака каждого союзника в этой зоне требует на 1 ОД меньше.

languages.text: 如果{g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}后线{/g}区域内没有任何敌人，则该区域所有盟友在各自{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内首次攻击时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}减低1点。
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: 如果后线区域内没有任何敌人，则该区域所有盟友在各自{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内首次攻击时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}减低1点。

languages.text: Si no hay enemigos en la {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}línea de defensa{/g}, el primer ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} efectuado por cada aliado presente en esa zona cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Si no hay enemigos en la línea de defensa, el primer ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} efectuado por cada aliado presente en esa zona cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos.

languages.text: Sind keine Gegner im Bereich der {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Abwehrlinie{/g}, kostet der erste Angriff während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} eines Verbündeten in diesem Gebiet -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: Wenn es im Abwehrlinie-Gebiet keine Feinde gibt, kostet der erste Angriff jedes Verbündeten in der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.

languages.text: En l'absence d'ennemis sur la {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Ligne de fond{/g}, la première attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} menée par chaque allié présent dans cette zone coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins.
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: En l'absence d'ennemis sur la Ligne de fond, la première attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} menée par chaque allié présent dans cette zone coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins.

languages.text: バックラインエリア内に敵がいない場合、そのエリア内にいるすべての味方による{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中の最初の攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が−1減少する。
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the Backline area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

traits.locale_text: バックラインエリア内に敵がいない場合、そのエリア内にいるすべての味方による{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中の最初の攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が−1減少する。

languages.text: {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Art Cephe{/g} alanında hiç düşman yoksa o alanda ve o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} herhangi bir dost birim tarafından yapılan ilk saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli 1 puan azalır.
languages.original_text: If there are no enemies in the {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area, the first attack in the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} made by every ally in that area costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
